posts.post_content: This was printed in The Dark. There were enchant lands in that set... including [Goblin Caves](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Goblin Caves ) , [Goblin Shrine](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Goblin Shrine) (this was especially good against the previous) and [Erosion](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Erosion). So this card wasn't so bad in its day.
